name: Slash Master
description:
Meet the hardest fruit slice game ever made!
Your task is to cut the fruits by dragging your finger...
Here you have a knife to cut the fruits, but be careful because if you left at lease one 
fruit then you will lose a life and you have only three lives so play carefully. 

The game is very addictive. Be honest because you have the score system so you can see your current 
score and your high score...Try to beat your high score but the highest score is of the developer.

In this game he made 1000 scores in it of course, because he played this game very time... So try 
to beat the score of the developer and be no. one, please also send us your score in the rating section so we 
can also know that how much you scored... this can be very hard to beat the 1000 scores but 
if you try then you can do this! Please also rate the game.

Download The Game

Thanks....
